original_text: There was another battle at Gath. Another descendant of Rapha fought against the Israelites there. He was a very large man. He had six fingers on each hand and six toes on each foot.
korean_text: 또 가드에서 전쟁할 때에 그 곳에 키가 큰 자 하나는 손가락과 발가락이 각기 여섯 개씩 모두 스물 네 개가 있는데 그도 거인족의 소생이라

sentences.original_text: There was another battle at Gath
Another descendant of Rapha fought against the Israelites there
sentences.korean_translation: 라파의 다른 후손이 그곳에서 이스라엘 사람들과 싸웠습니다

sentences.original_text: He was a very large man
He had six fingers on each hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 각 손에 여섯 개의 손가락을 가졌습니다

sentences.original_text: and six toes on each foot
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 각 발에 여섯 개의 발가락을 가졌습니다
